translation.Desenvolvedor Front-End, atualmente esto: Front-End Developer, Currently focused on React JS.
translation.Eu sou um Desenvolvedor Front-End apaixo: I'm a Web Developer passionate about React, Next and Responsive Design.
translation.Tento melhorar minhas habilidades em cad: I try to improve my skills in each project, mainly organization and speed.
translation.Estou interessado em oportunidades de em: I am interested in job opportunities. Not just to work, but also to gain experience and help solve problems.
translation.Também estou aceitando trabalhos como fr: I am also accepting jobs as a freelancer.
translation.Pode entrar em contato por qualquer meio: You can contact me by any means:
translation.Adoro o Frontend, eu gosto de criar códi: I love Frontend, I like to create code from scratch, and turn Designs into functional things.
translation.Não sou muito fã de Backend, mas consigo: I'm not a big fan of Backend, but when I need to do Backend I can handle well.
translation.Estou iniciando no Desenvolvimento Mobil: I'm starting in Mobile Development, with my knowledge of React.js I've already learned the basics. And I'm studying more and more.
translation.Fiz curso de Fullstack, apesar de não go: I finished a Fullstack course, even though I don't like the backend, I deal well and I can work as a Fullstack
